Class TaskRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.simple.jira.model.repository.TaskRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskStore
public class TaskRepository extends Object implements TaskStore
In-memory repository managing tasks assigned to projects The repository delegates project existence validation to ProjectStore.findById(int) and keeps task data immutable See Task for the task model and ModelOperationException for domain errors thrown by this class
Version:
1.0
Author:
michalkubina
See Also:
  • ProjectStore
  • TaskStore

      public List<Task> findByProject(int projectId)
      Retrieves tasks associated with the selected project
      Specified by:
      findByProject in interface TaskStore
      Parameters:
      projectId - identifier of the owning project
      Returns:
      immutable list of tasks belonging to the project
      Throws:
      ModelOperationException - when the project does not exist

      Specified by:
      addTask in interface TaskStore
      Parameters:
      projectId - identifier of the owning project
      title - task title provided by the user
      description - task description provided by the user
      Returns:
      immutable task instance that was created
      Throws:
      ModelOperationException - when the project does not exist

      Ensures the selected project contains at least one task

      projectId - identifier of the owning project
      Returns:

      Throws:
